original_title: The Afternoon Knows What the Morning Never Suspected
overview: The Afternoon Knows What the Morning Never Suspected reflects on Steele's own history as a war resister who found refuge in Canada through a reading session in which two young women, both war refugees, share passages about the history of the Vietnam War and Canada's role in the conflict as a war profiteer.
title: The Afternoon Knows What the Morning Never Suspected
